alert.note: Alert for Marshall; St. Joseph; Starke (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 12:26PM EST until February 22 at 8:30AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... Wabash River near Linn Grove affecting Adams and Wells Counties. Saint Joseph River Ohio near St. Joe River Ft. Wayne affecting Allen IN County. Saint Marys River at St. Mary`s River near Fort Wayne affecting Allen IN County. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Indiana...Ohio...Michigan... Salamonie River at Portland affecting Jay County. Wabash River at Wabash affecting Cass IN, Miami and Wabash Counties. Ottawa River near Kalida affecting Putnam County. Auglaize River near Defiance affecting Defiance County. Maumee River near Defiance affecting Henry and Defiance Counties. Saint Joseph River Michigan at Niles affecting Elkhart, Berrien and St. Joseph IN Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Ohio...Michigan... Salamonie River below Warren affecting Wabash, Huntington, Blackford, Wells and Jay Counties. Wabash River near Bluffton IN affecting Wells County. Eel River at North Manchester affecting Cass IN, Miami, Wabash, Whitley and Kosciusko Counties. Auglaize River near Fort Jennings affecting Allen OH, Paulding and Putnam Counties. Blanchard River at Ottawa affecting Putnam County. Maumee River at Napoleon affecting Henry County. Maumee River at Fort Wayne affecting Allen IN and Paulding Counties. Elkhart River at Goshen affecting Noble and Elkhart Counties. Saint Joseph River Michigan at South Bend affecting Elkhart, Berrien and St. Joseph IN Counties. Kankakee River at Davis affecting Starke, La Porte and St. Joseph IN Counties. Yellow River at Plymouth affecting Marshall, Starke and St. Joseph IN Counties. Saint Joseph River Ohio below Montpelier affecting Williams County. Saint Joseph River Ohio near Newville affecting Allen IN, De Kalb and Defiance Counties. Tiffin River at Stryker affecting Fulton OH, Williams and Defiance Counties. North Branch Elkhart River at Cosperville affecting Noble County. .These river rises will shift ice within the river and could lead to ice jams. This forecast is based on unobstructed flow and does not factor additional rises associated with ice jams. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Yellow River at Plymouth. * WHEN...Until Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.5 feet, Some residential and commercial properties near the Jefferson Street Bridge begin to flood. At 14.0 feet, A small trailer park near the Jefferson Street bridge begins to flood. At 14.5 feet, The parking lot on Laporte Street begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:45 AM EST Friday /10:45 AM CST Friday/ the stage was 12.3 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage late this afternoon to 14.5 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage Monday morning to 11.3 feet and begin rising again early Wednesday afternoon. It will rise to 11.4 feet Thursday morning. It will then fall again and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
